Extract through winzip, mount the bin file with Daemon Tools (make sure you display "all files" when looking for bin to mount) and it'll boot up no problem.

But its a easy fix:

Rename the ".bin" and ".cue" to "goldium".

The ".cue" is just a soundtrack CD, teh ".bin" is the game
